extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    • Field Detail

      • id

        protected java.lang.Long id

      • type

        protected java.lang.String type

      • identifier

        protected java.lang.String identifier
        Unique identifier for the download (e.g. a combination of PI and LOGID for PDFs).

      • pi

        protected java.lang.String pi

      • logId

        protected java.lang.String logId

      • message

        protected java.lang.String message

      • lastRequested

        protected java.util.Date lastRequested
        Timestamp of the last request for this download. This can be the time of the initial request, the time of generation completion or any subsequent requests. This + TTL is the time of expiration.

      • ttl

        protected long ttl

      • status

        protected DownloadJob.JobStatus status

      • description

        protected java.lang.String description
        Description field for stack traces, etc.

      • observers

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> observers
        E-mail recipients that will be notified once the download generation is complete.

        email - Optional e-mail address to be notified.
        pi -
        logId -
        downloadIdentifier - Identifier has (Construct via DownloadJob.generateDownloadJobId()).
        ttl - Number of ms before the job expires.

      • getDownloadFile

        public java.io.File getDownloadFile(java.lang.String pi,
                                    java.lang.String logId,
                                    java.lang.String type)
        Parameters:
        pi - The pi of the work to download.
        logId - the logId of the structure element to download. Is ignored if it is null, empty, blank or equals "-"
        type - either "pdf" or "epub"
        Returns:
        The Download location file, ending with ".pdf" or ".epub" depending on type
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the pi is null, empty or blank, or if the type is not "epub" or "pdf"

      • getDownloadFileStatic

        protected static java.io.File getDownloadFileStatic(java.lang.String identifier,
                                                    java.lang.String type,
                                                    java.lang.String extension)
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier of the download
        type - either "pdf" or "epub"
        extension -
        Returns:
        The Download location file, ending with ".pdf" or ".epub" depending on type
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the hash is null, empty or blank, or if the type is not "epub" or "pdf"
